A vindication of the faithful rebuke to a false report against the rude cavils of the pretended defence Alsop, Vincent, 1629 or 30-1703.
152 p.
Printed for John Lawrence ..., London : 1698.
Written by Vincent Alsop. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
